stage.name: Setup Folders
stage.narrative: Sets up Environment with the required folder structure for testing.

input.name: Target Element
input.narrative: The name of the folder (use processes/objects for root) you wish to right click on

input.name: Group Name
input.narrative: The name you wish to give the group.

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

stage.name: Move Folder Root/Happy
stage.narrative: Tests the following Moving of a nested folder to Root - No restrictions should be applied. Moving of an unrestricted folder to another unrestricted folder - No Restrcitions should be applied

decision.expression: [Resctrictions Removed] = False AND [Restrictions Applied] = False
[Value From Unrestricted] = True

exception.detail: "folder is expected to be unresctricted at this point"

decision.expression: [Value From Unresctricted After] = True

exception.detail: "folder is expected to be unresctricted at this point"

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative: Move folder 'Process Group B' from Folder 'Process Group A' to 'Process Group C'.

stage.name: Move Permissions Applied (restricted)
stage.narrative:
Senario Folder is moved into a folder with restrcitions set
Outcome Restrictions applied to the folder being moved, inherited from it's new parent folder

decision.expression: [Value From Inherited] = False AND [Value From Restricted] = True AND [Value From Unrestricted] = False
[Value From Unrestricted (Moved)] = False AND [Value From Restricted (Moved)] = False AND [Value From Inherited (Moved)] = True

exception.detail: "Access Rights not as expected after Folder Moved"

decision.expression: [Restrictions Applied] = True AND [Resctrictions Removed] = False

stage.name: Move Permissions Removed (unrestricted)
stage.narrative:
Senario Folder with resctrictions is moved into a folder(root) without restrcitions set
Outcome Unresctrcited now set

decision.expression: [Value From Inherited] = False AND [Value From Restricted] = False AND [Value From Unrestricted] = True
[Value From Unrestricted (Moved)] = True AND [Value From Restricted (Moved)] = False AND [Value From Inherited (Moved)] = False

exception.detail: "Access Rights not as expected after Folder Moved"

decision.expression: [Restrictions Applied] = False AND [Resctrictions Removed] = True

stage.name: Set/Remove Restrictions
stage.narrative: Senario Setting Resctricted and unrestricted on a folder with no child structure Outcome Set correclty no warning messages

stage.name: Set/Remove Restrictions Nested
stage.narrative: Senario Setting restricted and unrestrcited with nested folders. Outcome Warnings messages are raised and accepted Checks inherited status (and text) is correct.

decision.expression: [Text from Inherited] = "Inherited from (Process Group A)"
[Value From Unrestricted] = True AND [Value From Restricted] = False AND [Value From Inherited] = False
[Value From Unrestricted (changed)] = False AND [Value From Restricted (changed)] = True AND [Value From Inherited (changed)] = False
[Value From Unrestricted (reset)] = True AND [Value From Restricted (reset)] = False AND [Value From Inherited (reset)] = False

([Value From Unrestricted (A)] = True AND [Value From Restricted (A)] = False AND [Value From Inherited (A)] = False) AND ([Value From Unrestricted (B)] = True AND [Value From Restricted (B)] = False AND [Value From Inherited (B)] = False) AND ([Value From Unrestricted (C)] = True AND [Value From Restricted (C)] = False AND [Value From Inherited (C)] = False)

stage.name: Move Permissions Overwritten
stage.narrative: Senario Folder with applied permissions moved within another folder with applied permissions, Outcome Warning, the permissions restrictions on current group will be replaced wsith the parent. Accepted, permissions on the moved folder should now be inherited.

decision.expression: ([Value From Unrestricted (D)] = True AND [Value From Restricted (D)] = False AND [Value From Inherited (D)] = False) AND ([Value From Unrestricted (E)] = True AND [Value From Restricted (E)] = False AND [Value From Inherited (E)] = False)

([Value From Unrestricted D (Moved)] = False AND [Value From Restricted D (Moved)] = True AND [Value From Inherited D (Moved)] = False) AND ([Value From Inherited E (Moved)] = True AND [Value From Restricted E (Moved)] = False AND [Value From Unrestricted E (Moved)] = False)

exception.detail: "Access Rights not as expected after Folder Moved"

decision.expression: [Restrictions Overwritten] = True AND [Resctritions Removed] = False AND [Restrictions Applied] = False

([Value From Unrestricted (A) Moved] = False AND [Value From Restricted (A) Moved] = True AND [Value From Inherited (A) Moved] = False) AND ([Value From Inherited (B) Moved] = True AND [Value From Restricted (B) Moved] = False AND [Value From Unrestricted (B) Moved] = False) AND ([Value From Inherited (C) Moved] = False AND [Value From Restricted (C) Moved] = False AND [Value From Unrestricted (C) Moved] = True)
[Check Restricted (E)] = True AND [Check Restricted (D)] = True
[Text from Inherited E] = "Inherited from (Process Group D)"
[Permission Restrictions Set?] = False AND [Permission Exceptions Set?] = False
[Permission Restrictions Set? Unrestricted] = False AND [Permission Exceptions Set? Unrestricted] = False

stage.name: Note2
stage.narrative: ToDo - Once permissions applied tests are complete.

decision.expression: [Text from Inherited] = "Inherited from (Object Group A)"
